# init(polyline:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new overlay view using the specified polyline overlay object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(polyline: MKPolyline)
```

## Parameters

- **polyline**: The polyline overlay containing information about the area the renderer draws. This object requires at least two points defining the line segment to draw. This parameter canâ€™t be `nil`.

## Return Value

An initialized polyline renderer object.
